newsitem.title: UK: London tea sale average price.
newsitem.headline: London tea sale average price.

text.p: The weighted average for the 4,542 packages of landed tea sold at this weeks London sale was 138.30 pence a kilo against 140.56 last week and 116.18 a year ago.
The average for the 89,169 pkgs sold so far this year is 129.51 pence against 114.18 pence for the 115,164 pkgs sold by this stage last year.
